page.title: 10The Church
page.content:
Our school is a Church of England School, and therefore has close connections with the church. The nearest one to the school is in Whitmore and this is the church that is most frequently visited by the pupils.
The Rector has three churches to look after; Whitmore, Maer and Chappel Chorlton. The School is equally welcome in all of these churches, but Whitmore is slightly larger and the nearest.
Every Friday the Rector (the Reverend John Porter) comes to school to take our assembly. He also takes special services such as harvest, Christmas, Easter and a Candlemass service. For some of these the pupils go to one of the three churches by coach.
